Reference

All functions

check_course()

Check Leanpub Course

make_course() check_structure()

Check for expected file structure and create missing

create_images()

Create PDF and PNGs from Google Slides

create_videos()

Create video from script and PNGs

didactr_auth() check_didactr_auth()

Authorize Application for didactr

gs_ari() gs_ari_spin()

Convert Google Slides and notes to video with ari

gs_ari_upload()

Convert Google Slides to Video and Upload to Youtube

gs_convert()

Convert Google Slides to PNGs and a script

leanpub_render()

Render Leanpub document

n_pdf_pages()

Count number of pages in PDF

pdf_to_images()

Convert PDF to Other Images using ImageMagick

pptx_notes()

Get Notes from a PowerPoint (usually from Google Slides)

update_youtube()

Update RDS object that tracks YouTube uploads

update_youtube_link()

Update Youtube Link

vids_to_youtube()

Upload videos to YouTube

xml_notes()

Get Notes from XML

yt_auth()

Authorize with Youtube
